ResourceHeader.Description: Ground-based vector magnetic field at Pinawa, Canada, 0.5 s Level-2, CARISMA Network, Higher latitude chain (Lat 50.2, Long 263.9). Station Code: PINA.
ResourceHeader.Acknowledgement: Please acknowledge NASA contract NAS5-02099 and V. Angelopoulos for use of data from the THEMIS Mission. Specifically: I. Mann for use of the data, and the CSA for support of the CARISMA network.

InformationURL.Description: Access to information about the CARISMA magnetometer array.

NumericalData.Keyword: CDF Global Attribute MISSION_GROUP: THEMIS CDF Global Attribute MISSION_GROUP: Ground-Based Investigations
CDF Global Attribute DISCIPLINE: Space Physics>Magnetospheric Science

Parameter.Name: B in HDZ Components
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: thg_mag_pina_epoch
Parameter.Description: Magnetic field B in HDZ vector components

Parameter.Name: H component of B
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: thg_mag_pina_epoch
Parameter.Description: H component of the Magnetic Field Vector
Parameter.Caveats: This parameter is virtual. It is calculated by calling the function ALTERNATE_VIEW with the following input parameters: thg_mag_pina.

Parameter.Name: D component of B
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: thg_mag_pina_epoch
Parameter.Description: D component of the Magnetic Field Vector
Parameter.Caveats: This parameter is virtual. It is calculated by calling the function ALTERNATE_VIEW with the following input parameters: thg_mag_pina.

Parameter.Name: Z component of B
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: thg_mag_pina_epoch
Parameter.Description: Z component of the Magnetic Field Vector
Parameter.Caveats: This parameter is virtual. It is calculated by calling the function ALTERNATE_VIEW with the following input parameters: thg_mag_pina.

Parameter.Name: thg_mag_pina_epoch
Parameter.Caveats: This parameter is virtual. It is calculated by calling the function COMP_THEMIS_EPOCH with the following input parameters: thg_mag_pina_epoch0, thg_mag_pina_time.
